locations.name: Abandoned Mega Mart
locations.description: A once-bustling retail giant now stands as a hollow shell of consumerism, its automatic doors permanently jammed open. The flickering emergency lights cast eerie shadows across overturned shopping carts and scattered debris. The faint smell of rotting produce mixes with something more sinister deeper in the store.
features: Bloody handprints leading to the stockroom
Shattered glass everywhere from looted electronics section
secrets: Rumored manager's office safe still intact behind barricaded door

special_types: Stockroom Stalkers (zombies that hide in shelves and ambush survivors)

locations.name: Sunset Ridge Subdivision
locations.description: A quiet suburban neighborhood frozen in time, with overgrown lawns and abandoned bicycles still lying in driveways. Most houses remain intact though some show signs of forced entry and struggle. The occasional wind chime creates an eerie soundtrack to the apocalypse.
secrets: One basement contains a survivor's detailed apocalypse journal

buildings.name: Sunset Ridge Apartments
buildings.description: A well-preserved apartment complex in the Sunset Ridge Subdivision, this building has remained largely untouched by the chaos outside. The exterior is clean, and the interior shows signs of recent habitation before being abandoned. Faded posters and scattered personal items hint at the lives once lived here. The building offers a relatively safe haven with multiple entry points and clear lines of sight.

rooms.name: Lobby
rooms.description: The main entrance area with a front desk and seating area.

rooms.name: Mail Room
rooms.description: A small room with mailboxes and package storage.

rooms.name: Apartment Units
rooms.description: Standard living spaces with bedrooms, kitchens, and bathrooms.

dangers: Potential zombie horde in dark corners
special_features: Rooftop access with good vantage points
Some units have working gas stoves

locations.name: Rustbelt Tool & Die
locations.description: A small manufacturing plant that once produced precision machine parts, now silent except for the occasional creak of metal settling. The skeletal remains of industrial equipment loom in the dim light filtering through broken skylights. A thin layer of metal dust coats every surface, muffling footsteps.
features: employee break room with intact vending machine
secrets: hidden safe in manager's office containing emergency cash

buildings.name: Rustbelt Tool & Die
buildings.description: A once-thriving industrial factory now stands as a fortified bastion against the undead. The reinforced steel doors and boarded-up windows suggest survivors have been here recently. The interior is a maze of machinery and makeshift barricades, with the faint smell of oil and decay lingering in the air. The upper floors provide a vantage point for scouting the surrounding area.
